name: Elegant Media
tagline: ISO9001 Quality Certified Mobile App Development
description:
Elegant Media is an Australian mobile technology company that delivers business solutions. Our clients range from first-time entrepreneurs, government organisations to large-scale enterprise businesses. We use mobile technologies to start new businesses or improve the efficiency of existing businesses.
Our team consists of experienced Consultants, Strategists, Analysts, Designers, Developers, Project Managers and Account Managers. From the initial contact, you will have direct access to one of our team members who will work with you towards the successful completion of your project.
While being based in Melbourne, we have delivered projects throughout Australia â€“ and we can make the required arrangements to deliver your project successfully regardless of your location. If you are a part of a large organisation, we can work directly with across teams to ensure the rollout of the final project is seamless.
Here are few of the services we offer,
iOS App Development for iOS, iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch
Android App development for Phones, Tablets, Android Wear
Backend data management systems
eCommerce, payment systems and shopping carts
App marketing and social engagement
Custom software applications
READ MORE...

locations.address: Level 4, Eastern Plaza Offices, Terminal Circuit
